term.title: folates

item.text: A group of heterocyclic compounds based on the pteroic acid skeleton (below) conjugated with one or more l-glutamate units. [image: Not defined]

term.citation: Citation: 'folates' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.F02472

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
